channel.title: Newest Client
channel.description: Hey, could someone please tell me the newest client type eg 377 or 459 or what ever? Also i would like the thing to make it connect to its self so i can go on it and check out its features [shadow=blue,left][u][i][b]without[/b][/i][/u][/shadow] some source to get on it

item.title: Newest Client
item.dc:creator: @barragey0uXD barragey0uXD
item.description:
@barragey0uXD wrote:

I didnt know this lol…

Read full topic

item.title: Newest Client
item.dc:creator: @Oh_Noes_PIERATS Oh Noes! PIERATS!
item.description:
@Oh_Noes_PIERATS wrote:

There are a few 450 - 459 clients areound but there is alot of work to be done. All login packets need to be decoded and figured out. Then we have to write a new connection handler for the server. This is a pain as jagex are being right twats and doing alot of shifting around etc so it will take a while to figure out what everything is.
Then we have to rewrite the packet handler as all the ID’s have changed and the data being sent has been modified in some cases.

Read full topic

item.title: Newest Client
item.dc:creator: @Tico135 Tico
item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

Try a different client source then. In the IP spot, type “localhost”.

item.title: Newest Client
item.dc:creator: @OWNER_2007 OWNER 2007
item.description:
@OWNER_2007 wrote:

[quote=“Tico135, post:9, topic:115448”][quote author=OWNER 2007 link=topic=164711.msg1535984#msg1535984 date=1182623632]
I have, but when i run them and i try to start up the client, i put in the username and pass, turn on ham, put in my ip but it says server is down =
[/quote]

The port of the client is probably set to the wrong one.[/quote]
nope its 43594 and it works for sources

Read full topic

item.title: Newest Client

item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

OWNER 2007:

I have, but when i run them and i try to start up the client, i put in the username and pass, turn on ham, put in my ip but it says server is down =\

The port of the client is probably set to the wrong one.

item.title: Newest Client
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

there isn’t one out yet, theres a 455 client but it can’t connect to anything because it trys to connect to actually runescape (which we can’t because we have got access) so its useless.

Read full topic

item.title: Newest Client
item.dc:creator: @Tico135 Tico
item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

OWNER 2007:

I just checked, but there was no downloads except for Oh Noes! PIERATS! “create your own basic 317 client” which gives me 100 errors when i compile it un-edited!And theres no downloads there due to the clean up! Do you know any links of any clients that DONT gives 100 errors when you compile them?

Try Taharoks SSB 5.1 and download a client from there.

Read full topic
